name: Bad Seed 2016
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

In Bad Seed, 2 to 4 players must carry the Demon Baby while being chased by Evil Powers. They must quickly throw the Baby at each other before he hurts them, and reach the end of the level to get rid of him.

Platform: PC / Engine: Unity 5
Number of players: 2 to 4

Producer : Etienne SENSIER
Game Design : Antony MICO and Romane RASIMI
Game Art : Louise ARQUEMBOURG, Julia DECH and Cédric
SOUTHAMMAVONG
Game Design & Programming : Arthur SCHIRRMANN
Game Programming : Valentin DELPORTE
Music & Sound Design : Denis RIVOIRE
